description: '''Skacore''' (also typeset as '''ska-core''') is a subgenre of ska punk that mixes [[ska]] with [[hardcore punk]] rather than just [[punk rock]]. Characteristics of skacore include hardcore-like drumming, ska-inspired “bouncy” riffs, and frequent use of horns. Pioneers of skacore were ska punk bands [[The Mighty Mighty Bosstones]], [[Operation Ivy (band)|Operation Ivy]], [[Against All Authority]], [[Voodoo Glow Skulls]], and [[Link 80]]. The genre name was popularised by The Mighty Mighty Bosstones with their 1993 EP [[Ska-Core, the Devil, and More]].
